messages.title: Yeadon Town Centre parking improvements
messages.content: Local Lib Dem Councillor, Colin Campbell is delighted that the City Council are to convert the now-derelict charity shop to Yeadon Lib Dem's long standing, following Lib Dem survey.

messages.title: £825 income tax cut for workers
messages.content: The leaflet mentions that Greg Mulholland has delivered an £825 tax cut to workers.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Greg and the Lib Dems lead campaign for airport rail link.
Greg Mulholland highlights an £825 income tax cut for workers.
Campaign to save Wharfedale Hospital from losing services.
Opposition to the Labour-run City Council's plans to build more than 2,000 new houses in greenbelt areas near the airport.

mentions.otherPartyLeaderCandidate: Ed Miliband, Labour-run Leeds City Council
mentions.tacticalSituation: Your CHOICE HERE IN LEEDS NW: Local champion Greg Mulholland MP or Ed Miliband's YES man; Voting UKIP only helps Ed Miliband.

issues.economy: Greg Mulholland highlights an £825 income tax cut for workers.
issues.environment: Opposition to the Labour-run City Council's plans to build more than 2,000 new houses in greenbelt areas near the airport. Save Wharfedale Hospital from losing services.
issues.health: Save Wharfedale Hospital from losing services. Use empty Wharfedale Wards, says Greg.

housing.content: Opposition to the Labour-run City Council's plans to build more than 2,000 new houses in greenbelt areas near the airport.

politicalExperience.duration: Ten years standing up for our area
politicalExperience.achievements: In ten years delivered first onsite mental health beds, fought to save our greenbelt, led the drive to clean up Wharfedale's rivers.

images.caption: Greg Mulholland MP, Councillor Colin Campbell and the Yeadon Lib Dem team fighting for our area all year round
